title: Build cats.center - Complete Cat Resource Hub
description:
Create cats.center as the ultimate cat resource hub - EVERYTHING CAT.

## Features
1. **Cat Breeds Directory** - All breeds with photos, characteristics, care info
2. **Cat Health Guide** - Common health issues, symptoms, when to see vet
3. **Cat Care Tips** - Nutrition, grooming, behavior, training
4. **Cat Products** - Reviews, recommendations (affiliate potential)
5. **Cat Community** - Forums, Q&A, user submissions
6. **Cat Finder** - Adoption resources, shelters, breeders
7. **Cat News** - Latest cat-related news and research

## Tech Stack
- Next.js frontend (consistent with ecosystem)
- Tailwind CSS
- PostgreSQL for user data
- Integration with meows.live for streaming content

## Target Domain
- cats.center

## Related
- meows.live (live streaming) - linked site
- 9lives.xyz (existing cat/gaming platform)
testing_plan:
1. Verify all pages load correctly
2. Test breed search and filtering
3. Test user registration
4. Test community posting
5. Verify mobile responsiveness
6. Test cross-links to meows.live
rollback_plan: Remove DNS records and k8s deployment if issues occur
